name: Digi Ninja Demo
description:
The year is 1983 and arcade machines use an internet before the modern one to function correctly. However, it's been infected with a malicious virus! You are a software code named "Digi Ninja" and you only have one order: destroy the virus. Test your skills and face dangerous foes like never before in Digi Ninja!

System Requirements:

  • Intel Core i3 processor/AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • 6gb or more RAM
  • NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030/ AMD Radeon HD 7560D or better
  • Windows 7 or newer
  • Graphics must be able to support OpenGL 3.0 or better

Here are some additional notes:

  1. This game consists of 3 levels as of now
  2. 3 new levels, as well as a new game mechanic will be added in March
  3. This game was made for an FBLA Competitive Event, and is still being made for that, so the ability to make mods will be cut for now
  4. The final version will be released sometime in July or August on the Microsoft Store for $14.99 USD, consisting of 45 Levels
  5. If things go well upon final release, multiple platforms will begin seeing support
